speaker: Dark Forest
lines: You step under the trees and the path narrows.
Leaves shift overhead and drop small shadows on the trail.
Birdsong pauses, then starts again farther off.
You see a moss-covered waystone leaning beside the path.
Mushrooms spot the trailâ€”white, red, and dark.
Light filters through branches in thin bands.
You listen and choose your way forward.

choices.text: Follow the hunter's trail cut with careful boots.
Step onto the moss path where no one steps twice the same way.
Enter the whispering clearing where ferns lean like eavesdroppers.
